<h3 id="X31793">X(31793) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: HUTSON INTOUCH AND 6th MIXTILINEAR</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^5-(b^2+8*b*c+c^2)*a^4-2*(b^3+c^3)*a^3+2*(b^4+c^4+3*(b^2+c^2)*b*c)*a^2+(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>
X(31793) = 3*X(3)-2*X(9940) = 5*X(3)-3*X(10202) = 4*X(3)-3*X(11227) = 3*X(3)-X(24474) = 2*X(4)-3*X(10157) = 3*X(20)+X(12528) = 3*X(40)-2*X(31797) = X(65)-3*X(165) = 3*X(72)-X(12528) = 3*X(165)-2*X(31787) = 3*X(210)-X(5691) = 3*X(210)-2*X(9947) = 3*X(353)-2*X(31820) = 3*X(354)-5*X(7987) = 3*X(381)-2*X(31822) = 3*X(392)-X(962) = 3*X(1699)-5*X(25917) = 4*X(5044)-3*X(10157) = 3*X(5777)-4*X(31835) = 2*X(31835)-3*X(31837)</b>
<p>
Let A'B'C' be the Hutson-extouch triangle.  Let L<sub>A</sub> be the tangent to the A-excircle at A', and define L <sub>B</sub> and L <sub>C</sub> cyclically.  Let A" = L<sub>B</sub>&cap;L <sub>C</sub>, B" = L <sub>C</sub>&cap;L<sub>A</sub>, C" = L<sub>A</sub>&cap;L <sub>B</sub>. Then triangle A"B"C" is homothetic to ABC and the orthic-of-intouch triangle at X(57), and X(31793) = X(942)-of- A"B"C".  (Randy Hutson, March 28, 2019)
</p>
<p>
X(31793) lies on these lines:
{1,3}, {2,5806}, {4,5044}, {5,5316}, {8,5787}, {10,8727}, {20,72}, {28,1902}, {30,5777}, {78,7580}, {84,3927}, {142,4301}, {210,5691}, {220,1766}, {226,5763}, {329,6259}, {353,31820}, {355,6851}, {381,31822}, {386,15852}, {392,443}, {405,31658}, {411,5440}, {515,6743}, {516,960}, {518,4297}, {548,13369}, {550,912}, {573,1212}, {610,21871}, {758,9943}, {936,19541}, {946,8728}, {1012,31445}, {1104,13329}, {1295,15439}, {1394,22117}, {1439,3160}, {1465,22072}, {1490,3940}, {1538,21616}, {1699,25917}, {1753,7497}, {1829,4219}, {1858,15338}, {2771,16111}, {2778,15647}, {2800,9942}, {2802,13226}, {2979,31816}, {3008,15489}, {3146,3876}, {3182,7955}, {3243,12120}, {3309,5592}, {3419,6836}, {3474,12709}, {3522,3868}, {3523,5439}, {3532,28787}, {3555,5731}, {3600,11035}, {3678,28164}, {3698,9588}, {3730,15853}, {3740,19925}, {3753,6857}, {3812,10164}, {3827,12262}, {3869,9778}, {3877,6904}, {3878,5493}, {3880,24391}, {3884,12436}, {3890,9776}, {3916,6909}, {3962,5918}, {4292,5762}, {4313,5728}, {4315,12128}, {5223,10864}, {5250,19520}, {5265,17626}, {5436,21153}, {5657,5791}, {5663,31836}, {5692,12688}, {5715,17528}, {5722,6865}, {5732,11523}, {5744,14923}, {5745,5836}, {5758,6916}, {5768,6764}, {5812,6850}, {5886,6989}, {5887,6869}, {5890,31819}, {5894,6001}, {5904,12680}, {6245,11362}, {6361,12672}, {6675,6684}, {6762,30283}, {6824,19855}, {6826,12699}, {6835,18482}, {6841,9956}, {6861,11231}, {6881,7958}, {6908,11374}, {6925,22792}, {7074,21147}, {7673,8732}, {7682,17527}, {8703,24475}, {9047,31732}, {9589,31671}, {9829,31818}, {9840,16601}, {9954,12527}, {10165,13374}, {10175,16616}, {10304,24473}, {10391,15556}, {10860,12526}, {11036,21151}, {11347,25930}, {11402,31808}, {11495,12520}, {11573,13348}, {11826,28146}, {11827,28160}, {12109,17704}, {12443,31800}, {12511,22836}, {12629,12842}, {12651,31435}, {13730,26935}, {15488,29571}, {15726,31803}, {20117,28150}, {21669,26878}, {22791,31838}, {28198,28452}, {30290,31391}</p>
<p>
X(31793) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 7957}, {20, 72}, {40, 14110}, {3057, 7991}, {3878, 5493}, {3962, 15071}, {5904, 12680}, {6361, 12672}, {31730, 31806}<br>
X(31793) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (4, 5044), (65, 31787), (942, 3), (5691, 9947), (5777, 31837), (7686, 6684), (7982, 31792), (9856, 960), (9943, 12512), (9957, 31786), (11573, 13348), (12109, 17704), (12688, 31821), (13369, 548), (22791, 31838), (24474, 9940), (31788, 3579), (31798, 40)<br>
X(31793) = anticomplement of X(5806)<br>
X(31793) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (7982, 8726, 15934), (9940, 24474, 942), (10857, 11531, 11518)<br>
</p>
